description:
For using the different cell filter, the API parameter different_cell needs to be passed to the corresponding filter.
but v2.1 API validation denies it and it didn't work at all.
title: Lack of API schema definition for different cell filter

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/220893
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=029ad7e1234c1fcd6913ea7e056ade74fe3cef5b

Branch:    master

commit 029ad7e1234c1fcd6913ea7e056ade74fe3cef5b
Author: Ken'ichi Ohmichi <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 8 02:48:30 2015 +0000

    Add API schema for different_cell filter
    
    For using the different cell filter, the API parameter different_cell
    needs to be passed to the corresponding filter. However v2.1 API
    validation denies it because there is not API parameter definition
    and it didn't work at all.
    This patch adds the API schema.
    
    Change-Id: Ic61b9a18722b7701b09e71f3f3a547ad9e6363c2
    Closes-Bug: #1492925
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
